DOC.brief_summary: Almost antipsychotic induce metabolic syndrome , Genetic factor play key role development metabolic syndrome , TCF7L2 SLC30A8 strongestly correlate metabolic syndrome.Moreover , Antipsychotics effect expression TCF7L2 SLC30A8 genes.It indicate variation TCF7L2 SLC30A8 play important part development antipsychotics-induced metabolic syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: The Mechanism TCF7L2 SLC30A8 Antipsychotic-induced Metabolic Syndrome
